abstract: Winter Sports Roundup; Marcel Hirscher wins World Cup giant slalom in Switzerland; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher of Austria won a race in Adelboden, Switzerland, while a storm jeopardized Lindsey Vonn’s scheduled super-G in Bad Kleinkirchheim, Austria.
snippet: Marcel Hirscher of Austria won a race in Adelboden, Switzerland, while a storm jeopardized Lindsey Vonn’s scheduled super-G in Bad Kleinkirchheim, Austria.

headline.main: Hirscher, Cup Leader, Wins Giant Slalom
headline.print_headline: Hirscher, Cup Leader, Wins Giant Slalom
